title: PostToCmrConfig
description: Describes the config used by the post-to-cmr task

bucket.description: the bucket the has the private/public key needed for decrypting cmr password

stack.description: The name of the deployment stack

cmr.description: credentials needed to post metadata to CMR

concurrency.description: Maximum concurrency of requests to CMR

launchpad.description: credentials needed to get launchpad token

republish.description: Whether to remove published granules from CMR and republish them again.

skipMetaCheck.description: Adds the option to allow PostToCMR to pass when processing a granule without a metadata file.
